notes.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
notes.p: The sample material was submitted to the Friedrich-Loeffler-Institut for enhanced diagnostics and was taken by the responsible farm veterinarian in the context of the health monitoring program of the respective farm (in accordance with the Regulation on hygiene requirements for the keeping of pigs; online available at http://www.gesetze-im-internet.de/schhalthygv/). In Germany, every keeper of pigs must have his herd supervised by a veterinarian as part of the on-farm inspections, this includes clinical and laboratory checks to maintain and improve the health status of the herd. No permissions were necessary to collect the mainly non-invasive specimens. The farmer approved in-detail analyses of the PED case and shipment of samples (verbal agreement with the responsible veterinarian). All procedures were carried out in accordance with the relevant regulations.
